title: Why are Blu-ray & DVD-making companies not against streaming services and trying to stop them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Who says they’re not? The Blu-ray and DVD making companies don’t have the ability to stop them. Remember, the movie production companies just hire Blu-Ray and DVD making companies to make the disks. The movie production companies are the ones who can decide whether or not to allow streaming, and they much prefer a model where people have to keep paying over and over to view a particular movie, against one where people can buy a copy and watch it whenever without having to keep paying.
